items.sentence: The police were hoping that Tom could shed some light on the incident.
Tom said it would be OK if I didn\'t attend this afternoon\'s meeting.
The front of Tom\'s shirt was stained with blood from a gunshot wound.
The restaurant we went to wasn\'t as expensive as I expected it to be.
I know that Tom can play the clarinet? Can he also play the saxophone?
I know that Tom can play the clarinet? Can he play the saxophone, too?
I speak French with my grandparents and speak English with my parents.
I think the jokes that Tom tells are funnier than the ones Mary tells.
I find it difficult to balance my career and the needs of my children.
I suppose it\'s a bit silly for me to worry about something like that.
